DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - To test effect Passport Comfort ( Passport ) intervention 1 3 month post-intervention compare baseline data high-intensity intervention . - To test effect select demographic disease/treatment variable outcomes Passport model 1 3 month post-intervention compare pre-intervention . - To examine perceive patient professional satisfaction Passport model . - To test effect Passport intervention compare high-intensity low-intensity . OUTLINE : Patients stratify accord cancer diagnosis ( breast v prostate v colon v lung ) , pain level ( < 4 v ≥ 4 pain scale ) , fatigue level ( < 4 v ≥ 4 fatigue scale ) . Patients assign 1 3 group . - Group 1 ( enrolled month 1-8 ) : Patients undergo pain fatigue assessment periodically demographic treatment data , Quality life-Patient Tool , BQII , Piper Fatigue Scale , Pain Fatigue Knowledge Tools , Patient Satisfaction Tool . Patients receive usual care undergo pain fatigue evaluation algorithm formal education . Research nurse conduct chart audit identify professional system barrier receive medical education , peer review , feedback . Medical professional undergo assessment periodically Demographic Data Tool , Pain Fatigue Knowledge Tools , Chart Audit Tool , Provider Satisfaction . - Group 2 ( enrolled month 9-30 ) : Patients medical professional assess periodically group 1 . Patients undergo high-intensity Passport intervention algorithm base National Comprehensive Cancer Network ( NCCN ) guideline , pain fatigue education weekly 4 week , follow-up reinforcement phone call every 2 week . Research nurse conduct chart audit congruence practice guideline , tape education session , receive feedback principal investigator form Tape-Monitoring Checklist . Medical oncologist attend training use algorithm , peer review pain fatigue management audit feedback , reinforce apply content clinical round . - Group 3 ( enrolled month 34-57 ) : Patients medical professional assess periodically group 1 . Patients undergo low-intensity Passport intervention group 2 . Medical professional conduct realistic implementation intervention exist system procedure within cancer center , less direct education system intervention , share group 2 experience . After completion study intervention , patient follow 1 3 month .
